verses.roman:
prabhu-saṅge madhyāhne akrūra tīrthe āilā
prabhura avaśiṣṭa-pātra-prasāda pāilā

synonyms: prabhu-saṅge—with the Lord; madhyāhne—in the afternoon; akrūra tīrthe—to Akrūra-tīrtha; āilā—came; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; avaśiṣṭa-pātra-prasāda—remnants of food; pāilā—got.
translation: Kṛṣṇadāsa returned to Akrūra-tīrtha with the Lord, and remnants of the Lord's food were given to him.
